languages.text: "Но разве можно... вы будто бы ничем не лучше Теодоры! Защитить святыню — долг каждого верного служителя Императора. Если вы откажетесь от этой миссии, я не смогу последовать за вами далее и отправлюсь искать других союзников".

traits.locale_text: "Но разве можно... вы будто бы ничем не лучше Теодоры! Защитить святыню — долг каждого верного служителя Императора. Если вы откажетесь от этой миссии, я не смогу последовать за вами далее и отправлюсь искать других союзников".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "But how can you not... It's like you're no better than Theodora! The protection of relics is the duty of every faithful servant of the Emperor. If you refuse to go on this mission, I won't be able to follow you henceforth and will set out in search of other allies."
languages.original_text: "Но разве можно... вы будто бы ничем не лучше Теодоры! Защитить святыню — долг каждого верного служителя Императора. Если вы откажетесь от этой миссии, я не смогу последовать за вами далее и отправлюсь искать других союзников".

traits.locale_text: "But how can you... it's like you're no better than Theodora was! The protection of relics is a duty of every faithful servant of the Emperor. If you refuse to go on this mission, I won't be able to follow you henceforth and will set out in search of other allies."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But how can you... it's like you're no better than Theodora was! The protection of relics is a duty of every faithful servant of the Emperor. If you refuse to go on this mission, I won't be able to follow you henceforth and will set out in search of other allies."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But how can you not... It's like you're no better than Theodora! The protection of relics is the duty of every faithful servant of the Emperor. If you refuse to go on this mission, I won't be able to follow you henceforth and will set out in search of other allies."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But how can you not... It's like you're no better than Theodora! The protection of relics is the duty of every faithful servant of the Emperor. If you refuse to go on this mission, I won't be able to follow you henceforth and will set out in search of other allies."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But how can you not... It's like you're no better than Theodora! The protection of relics is the duty of every faithful servant of the Emperor. If you refuse to go on this mission, I won't be able to follow you henceforth and will set out in search of other allies."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “可你怎么能不帮我这个忙……看来你比西奥多拉好不到哪里去！保护圣物是帝皇每位忠诚仆人的职责。如果你不肯执行这个任务，那我接下来就没办法跟随你了。我要去寻找别的盟友了。”
languages.original_text: "But how can you not... It's like you're no better than Theodora! The protection of relics is the duty of every faithful servant of the Emperor. If you refuse to go on this mission, I won't be able to follow you henceforth and will set out in search of other allies."

traits.locale_text: “可你怎么能不帮我这个忙……看来你比西奥多拉好不到哪里去！保护圣物是帝皇每位忠诚仆人的职责。如果你不肯执行这个任务，那我接下来就没办法跟随你了。我要去寻找别的盟友了。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Pero ¿cómo puede no...? ¡Es como si fuera igual que Theodora! Proteger las reliquias es el deber de todo fiel siervo del Emperador. Si se niega a emprender esta misión, no podré acompañarle y tendré que buscar a otros que me acompañen».
languages.original_text: "But how can you not... It's like you're no better than Theodora! The protection of relics is the duty of every faithful servant of the Emperor. If you refuse to go on this mission, I won't be able to follow you henceforth and will set out in search of other allies."

traits.locale_text: «Pero ¿cómo puede no...? ¡Es como si fuera igual que Theodora! Proteger las reliquias es el deber de todo fiel siervo del Emperador. Si se niega a emprender esta misión, no podré acompañarle y tendré que buscar a otros que me acompañen».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「では、なぜそうしない…まるでシオドーラと変わらないではないか！聖遺物の保護は、皇帝に仕えるすべての忠実な者の義務だ。もし陛下がこの任務に行くことを拒むなら、我は今後御身に従うことはできない。他の同盟者を探しに旅立つことになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "But how can you not... It's like you're no better than Theodora! The protection of relics is the duty of every faithful servant of the Emperor. If you refuse to go on this mission, I won't be able to follow you henceforth and will set out in search of other allies."

traits.locale_text: 「では、なぜそうしない…まるでシオドーラと変わらないではないか！聖遺物の保護は、皇帝に仕えるすべての忠実な者の義務だ。もし陛下がこの任務に行くことを拒むなら、我は今後御身に従うことはできない。他の同盟者を探しに旅立つことになるだろう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Aber wir könnt Ihr nicht ...? Ihr seid anscheinend nicht besser als Theodora! Der Schutz von Relikten ist die Pflicht jedes frommen Dieners des Imperators. Wenn Ihr diese Mission verweigert, kann ich Euch nicht länger folgen und werde mir andere Verbündete suchen."
languages.original_text: "But how can you not... It's like you're no better than Theodora! The protection of relics is the duty of every faithful servant of the Emperor. If you refuse to go on this mission, I won't be able to follow you henceforth and will set out in search of other allies."

traits.locale_text: "Aber wir könnt Ihr nicht ...? Ihr seid anscheinend nicht besser als Theodora! Der Schutz von Relikten ist die Pflicht jedes frommen Dieners des Imperators. Wenn Ihr diese Mission verweigert, kann ich Euch nicht länger folgen und werde mir andere Verbündete suchen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Comment pouvez-vous refuser ? C'est à croire que vous ne valez pas mieux que Théodora ! La protection des reliques fait partie des responsabilités de tous les fidèles serviteurs de l'Empereur. Si vous ne daignez pas prendre part à cette mission, je ne pourrai plus vous accompagner et devrai partir à la recherche de nouveaux alliés. »
languages.original_text: "But how can you not... It's like you're no better than Theodora! The protection of relics is the duty of every faithful servant of the Emperor. If you refuse to go on this mission, I won't be able to follow you henceforth and will set out in search of other allies."

traits.locale_text: « Comment pouvez-vous refuser ? C'est à croire que vous ne valez pas mieux que Théodora ! La protection des reliques fait partie des responsabilités de tous les fidèles serviteurs de l'Empereur. Si vous ne daignez pas prendre part à cette mission, je ne pourrai plus vous accompagner et devrai partir à la recherche de nouveaux alliés. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Nasıl böylece kayıtsız kalabilirsin? Theodora'dan ne farkın var? Yadigârların muhafazası, İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârlarının görevidir! Bu göreve çıkmayı reddedersen saflarından kalamam, yeni müttefikler arayışına koyulacağım."
languages.original_text: "But how can you not... It's like you're no better than Theodora! The protection of relics is the duty of every faithful servant of the Emperor. If you refuse to go on this mission, I won't be able to follow you henceforth and will set out in search of other allies."

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl böylece kayıtsız kalabilirsin? Theodora'dan ne farkın var? Yadigârların korunması, İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârlarının görevidir! Bu göreve çıkmayı reddedersen senin saflarında kalmaya devam edemem. Bu durumda kendime yeni müttefikler bulacağım."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
